name: SCAJ
description:
SCAJ - Swap Colors And Jump

This game was made for Game Endeavor Game Jam hosted by... Game Endeavor

Controls:

Right mouse button to swap colors

Left mouse button to jump

Jump varies between colors

Art was made by me. Yes, I drew all those wonderful looking cubes.

Made with:

Godot Engine v3.2.2.stable.official

GraphicsGale

Bosca Ceoil

Thank you for playing.
